item.description: On Monday, January 23, starting at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present “A Disproof of God from the Turing Test,” an open discussion to mark the 2012 Turing Centenary, based in part on A. M. Turing, “Computing Machinery and Intelligence,” Mind 59 (1950): 433-60, www.loebner.net/Prizef/TuringArticle.html. Location: Rm. 442 of the BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free and open to the public. More info: DASociety@aol.com.
item.name: Disproof Atheism Society presents: A Disproof of God from the Turing Test
